'''Merimas Brandybuck''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[Buckland]].

==History==
Merimas was the eldest child, and only son, of [[Marmadas Brandybuck]]. He was present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Bilbo's Birthday Party]].<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The meaning of the name ''Merimas'' is unknown. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] noted that the names of the Bucklanders had a vaguely [[Celtic]] style.<ref name="Translation">{{App|Translation}}, p. 1135</ref>

[[Jim Allan]] suggests that ''Merimas'' is a variation of the name ''[[Merimac Brandybuck|Merimac]]'' with an ''-as'' ending.<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names", p. 204</ref>

The first element, ''Meri'' also occurrs in ''[[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Meriadoc]]''.

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Merimas Brandybuck can be found in [[Buckland]]. He occupies the role of a crafting vendor in the game and plays no role in the storyline.
